pma:database.name: id2770899_godawaidb
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `orders` ( `order_id` bigint(255) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `p_names` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `cus_name` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `contact_no` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `zip_code` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `country` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `details` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `quantity` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`order_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=11 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `products` ( `product_id` bigint(255) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `product_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `details` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `price` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `c_price` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `brand` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `tags` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `product_type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `image` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`product_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=141 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
